extendedInfo.description: Livestream for Producers lets you create events and GO LIVE for free!The Livestream for Producers mobile app is a full suite of live event coverage tools exclusively for New Livestream - now including broadcasting live video from your Android device.Everyone can take advantage of the New Livestream with the first ever free, ad-free live streaming and live blogging service.  The New Livestream is the next generation in live event coverage combining live video with real-time photos, text, and video clip updates. Features on the New Livestream includes the industry's most advanced live video player along with an array of tools that allow more people to discover your event, interact with it and share it across the web.** Android App FEATURES **- Broadcast Live video to your event page (Live Video)- Create a free, ad-free new livestream account- Manage your New Livestream Account (Create, delete, publish events)- Create event posters from phone photos (Live Event Page)- Post Photos which appear in real-time on your event page (Live blogging)- Post Videos which appear in real-time on your event page (Live blogging)- Post Text Updates which appear in real-time on your event page (Live blogging)- Remote control and preview of the Livestream Broadcaster Device (Live Video)- Moderate comments during live events and on archived posts - Built-in FTP server to receive live photos from Wifi equipped DSLR cameras. (Live Blogging) Find out more http://bit.ly/HnHvej** What is the Livestream Broadcaster? **The Livestream Broadcaster is a new hardware device that lets you broadcast HD Live video to the web without a PC. Connect to any HDMI camera or mixer and broadcast live to the web and mobile devices over a wired, wireless or 3G/4G Internet connection. You can control the Livestream Broadcaster using the iOS app from anywhere in the world. You can learn more and purchase the Livestream Broadcaster by visiting:http://store.livestream.com/products/livestream-broadcaster for more information.

reviews.title: Great Site
reviews.comment: this site is perfect for talking with or looking up book authors and new and old musician. listening to the politicians whatever your heart desires I would try it it is great site.
reviews.author: margaret a capra

reviews.title: Does not work with Samsung Camera
reviews.comment: What could be this app\'s best ally, the new Samsung Android Camera, is an utter failure. The system cannot keep up with the camera\'s output, the zoom does not work at all on the zoom button and you get something like 3* zoom otherwise - but it won\'t focus. Utter and complete failure.    If this worked I\'d give it 5 stars - but it simply does not work.
reviews.author: Peter Scargill

reviews.title: Why can\'t I view?
reviews.comment: On internet format, my device \"could not play video\" so i downloaded this and its very confusing. i would like to be able to watch livestreams
reviews.author: Eve Machin

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: This is really user friendly & makes live streaming easy & enjoyable.
reviews.author: Ronnie Bhabikhan

reviews.title: Better than UStream!
reviews.comment: It lets you change camera angles unlike UStream.  Also has more features and a more advanced encoder.

reviews.title: Works!
reviews.comment: Mic adjustment from mobile phone would be cool...unless I\'m just not seeing it yet.

reviews.title: So-so.
reviews.comment: Works great  but has major problems. Quality sucks and tere is a delay or lag when viewing from website. Not giving five stars because the app is mediocre.

reviews.comment: Awesome program! So much better than ustream
reviews.author: David Wilks

reviews.title: Good but..
reviews.comment: How on earth do you watch loverdress on this app. I want to watch streams on the go, not create a stream.
reviews.author: Danger Wasp

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: A few minor problems with streaming bite rate, stream disconnect. I cannot change the streaming bit rate. That would be a few great feature to add during setup.  Otherwise works great.
reviews.author: William Hardrick

reviews.title: useless.
reviews.comment: I was hoping the app would be like the Procaster where it captures and streams the device\'s screen, not from the camera. I wanted to stream drawing art on my (soon to be) tablet, and I\'m merely doing research using my current smartphone. Also, I can\'t even set an event and always shows as \"Could not create event. Please try again.\" I\'m not really sure what\'s happening but I\'m quite disappointed. I can\'t even browse for other events regardless what I type in. It\'s very annoying that it prompts me to logout everytime. Can\'t it always be online even if you exit the app? Look like I\'m looking for an expensive Windows 8 tab with Wacom digitizer that can run Procaster instead of a Droid that runs this dud app.
reviews.author: Timothy Lois Tecson

reviews.title: Not working in samsun s series
reviews.comment: I was downloaded this while creating event i was stopped after uploaded my event pic  and showed us a message like\" sorry unable to create event try next time\".
reviews.author: Gowri Sankar

reviews.title: Lacks key feature.
reviews.comment: This app is great for people doing vlogs and livestreaming from their cameras, BUT IT NEEDS A FEATURE TO LIVESTREAM WHAT YOU\'RE DOING ON YOUR PHONE! For example, if i want to livestream a GAME that I am playing on my phone, being able to DIRECTLY stream that would make this, quite literally, the best app possible. PLEASE INCLUDE THIS FEATURE! Until then, we all await an update!
reviews.author: David Dood

reviews.title: Best streaming service
reviews.comment: This app is gr8 for streaming from your phone. Galaxy S4 =0)
